code: import{useContext,useState}from"react";import{Link,Navigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{UserContext}from"../UserContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LoginPage(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[redirect,setRedirect]=useState(false);const{setUser}=useContext(UserContext);async function handleloginsubmit(ev){ev.preventDefault();try{const{data}=await axios.post('/login',{email,password});setUser(data);alert('Login Successfull');setRedirect(true);}catch(error){alert('Login failed');}}if(redirect){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:'/'});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 grow flex items-center justify-around",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-64",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl text-center",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:"",className:"max-w-md mx-auto",onSubmit:handleloginsubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"your@emailid",value:email,onChange:ev=>setEmail(ev.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"password",value:password,onChange:ev=>setPassword(ev.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primary",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center py-2 text-gray-500",children:["Don't have an account yet?",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/register',className:"underline text-black",children:"Register"})]})]})]})});}
